jobDescription: DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:Accesses data from a variety of sources, including RDMS, NoSQL, or API.Performs data aggregations, joins, manipulations, and cleaning to ensure data integrity throughout the entire analytical process.Solves problems by applying a variety of predictive modeling/machine learning/deep learning techniques.Works closely with the Data Engineering and Product teams to ensure the successful completion of projects.Decomposes problem statements into specific deliverables and requirements.QUALIFICATIONS:Advanced SQL skills and is comfortable operating with relational data models and structure.Is capable of accessing data via a variety of API/RESTful services.Advanced programming skills in Python, or similar analytical language.Intermediate knowledge of cloud environments.Intermediate understanding of software development and collaboration, including experience with tools such as Git.Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, comfortable presenting in front of large audiences.A basic understanding of Agile methodologies and continuous delivery.Good to have excellent data visualization skills, determine the appropriate visualization for a variety of data types.Good to have proven track record of leading successful projects and driving measurable, viable results using Data Science techniques. Send To Email / Remind Me WEB-DOM01-NEW
